snippet: Wimbledon will naturally miss an old favorite with Rafael Nadal sidelined by injury yet Garbine Muguruza, armed with her sunny demeanor and blistering talent, seems perfectly happy and equipped to fill the void left by her great Spanish compatriot...
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon will naturally miss an old favorite with Rafael Nadal sidelined by injury yet Garbine Muguruza, armed with her sunny demeanor and blistering talent, seems perfectly happy and equipped to fill the void left by her great Spanish compatriot.

headline.print_headline: Without Rafa, Muguruza Flies Wimbledon Flag for Spain
headline.main: Without Rafa, Muguruza Flies Wimbledon Flag for Spain
